video.title: The Carrie Diaries
video.synopsis: Teenage Carrie Bradshaw navigates high school while harboring dreams of becoming a writer in this "Sex and the City" prequel.

episodes.synopsis: As Carrie Bradshaw starts her junior year of high school in the wake of a family tragedy, she can't help but feel as though all eyes are upon her.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: A grounded Carrie worries that Sebastian will lose interest in her -- and Donna's sneaky attempts to break them apart don't help.
episodes.title: Lie with Me

episodes.synopsis: When Carrie's dad forbids her to see Sebastian again, Carrie snoops through her father's work files and uncovers some alarming information.
episodes.title: Read Before Use

episodes.synopsis: While Carrie and Walt meet up with Larissa at a Halloween party in the city, Maggie and Mouse check out Sebastian's soiree at the diner.
episodes.title: Fright Night

episodes.synopsis: Carrie's feelings for Sebastian get in the way when she's invited to a swanky dinner soiree in Manhattan. Mouse asks Walt for sex tips.
episodes.title: Dangerous Territory

episodes.synopsis: Carrie tries to cook the perfect Thanksgiving dinner for her family and her new boyfriend. But the results aren't exactly what she was going for.
episodes.title: Endgame

episodes.synopsis: Larissa offers Carrie an internship, but Carrie's torn about taking it. Meanwhile, Dorrit and her dad take in a showing of "The Nutcracker."
episodes.title: Caught

episodes.synopsis: The junior-senior lock-in gives Carrie the perfect cover for a night out in Manhattan -- until a surprise encounter turns her night upside-down.
episodes.title: Hush Hush

episodes.synopsis: When Dorrit goes missing under Carrie's watch, Carrie lashes out at Sebastian, the one person who can help her find her sister.
episodes.title: The Great Unknown

episodes.synopsis: On her 17th birthday, Carrie is torn between an opportunity to mingle with New York's literati and spending time with her friends and Sebastian.
episodes.title: The Long and Winding Road Not Taken

episodes.synopsis: Carrie jumps at the chance to a take on Larissa's identity but gets more than she bargained for when her hijinks catch up with her.
episodes.title: Identity Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Carrie's quest for the perfect night with Sebastian only make things worse. Meanwhile, Tom spends the night someplace new.
episodes.title: A First Time for Everything

episodes.synopsis: While Carrie preps for her junior prom, Dorrit takes things with Miller to the next level and Mouse defies her parents to date who she wants.
episodes.title: Kiss Yesterday Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: While living it up in Manhattan for the summer, Carrie bumps into Sebastian and Samantha Jones, the woman who will become her lifelong friend.
episodes.title: Win Some, Lose Some

episodes.synopsis: Carrie and Walt must confront a far-too-comfortable Samantha, who's overstayed her welcome at the loft. Walt tries to tell Bennet how he feels.
episodes.title: Express Yourself

episodes.synopsis: Larissa returns from Kyoto and clashes with Samantha. Carrie goes back to school, where she has a difficult time avoiding Sebastian.
episodes.title: Strings Attached

episodes.synopsis: Carrie's job is in jeopardy when playwright Adam Weaver gives her a difficult interview. Carrie and Dorrit forge a surprising alliance.
episodes.title: Borderline

episodes.synopsis: Carrie spends an exciting day with Weaver while Samantha tangles with an art student. Sebastian has trouble accepting his mom's marriage plans.
episodes.title: Too Close For Comfort

episodes.synopsis: While Carrie wrestles with writer's block, Maggie and Sebastian uncover some shocking news, and Samantha and Larissa finally find a common interest.
episodes.title: The Safety Dance

episodes.synopsis: Carrie feels betrayed when someone spreads a rumor about her, while Mouse is anxious over a risqué stunt gone awry and Maggie has a medical emergency.
episodes.title: I Heard Rumor

episodes.synopsis: Walt finds an unexpected father figure after his parents throw him out. While Carries struggles to keep her job, Maggie tries to face her dad.
episodes.title: The Second Time Around

episodes.synopsis: Dorrit throws a wild party when Tom is away on business overnight, and Sebastian's waffling over a big decision is driving Carrie a little nuts.
episodes.title: Under Pressure

episodes.synopsis: Walt doesn't cope well with some devastating news. Maggie needs help when she makes a mistake and Sebastian bails on Carrie on Valentine's Day.
episodes.title: Date Expectations

episodes.synopsis: Bennet and Carrie get in trouble with Larissa, while Sebastian has problems with his dad and Tom gets unexpected advice about a difficult lawyer.
episodes.title: Hungry Like the Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Carrie and her pals attend the prom together, and Larissa offers Carrie an opportunity that both angers Tom and prompts Carrie to rethink her future.
episodes.title: This is the Time

episodes.synopsis: It's graduation day for Carrie and her friends, with momentous changes in store for everyone as they make the biggest decisions of their lives.
episodes.title: Run to You
